title: Onyeeze
author: Onyeeze
content: I know people will be wondered why I'm excited and the reason my subject is named ' MY HAPPINESS ' I'm happy because i understand that this forum is all about your desperation and continuity of learning, and i understand from other ways that this forum knowledge is infinity learning since Bitcoin is existing. So my happiness is that i have finally earned a merit and i promised that if i earn a 1 merit i will be glad, now i have earned 16 merits and am so glad. Reference   one of the things that makes people to make good content in posting Quote Despite that I'm new and i haven't earn merit, but i believe with research and time i will earn merit, i will be happiest person the day i will earn a merit  i believe that learning and consistent reading is the key of growth for the forum, Many people referred me to read pinned post and i noticed that with pinned post reading will make any newbies to know valuable things of the past, therefore a board i click i do read pinned post's knowing that they are important post's. My newbies mate's don't be discourage of stopping half way, please continue pushing with your personal innovation.Quote from: Welsh on January 12, 2023, 09:15:25 PMDon't focus on merit, and it'll come. Focus on merit, and you'll be outed for writing for the sake of merit.  this point only made me to know that we don't need to be conscious of anything, and what we need to create our personal innovation which people will follow our style's.For the newbies to go further, we need to have the following.1. We need to have courage2. Be determined3. Take correction's4. Read the pinned post's 5. Make quality post's6. Preview before posting7. Avoid copy & paste work 8. Be creative 1. we need to have courageEncouragement will make a newbie to not been backslide, some people has be distracted and fails to continue learning for the forum because of criticizing from people, and if you follow some response of people you will be discouraged, and what we need to Excel is to have courage that you will learn and teach others.2.Be determinedA determination is the key of everything and is not far from courage, unless someone is not determine and it will devote time to learn from a place where education is free, when i noticed that's lessons of Bitcoin for the forum is free of charge and began to think of the profit of the sites, so if you are determined you will acquire the knowledge of Bitcoin and altcoins for free without charges.3. Take correction'sFrom my studies and confirmed that some of my fellow newbies doesn't sometimes accept correction's from the superior ones, and that makes them to run out of the forum without anything. For a newbie and someone who have bitcoin and forum in mind to grow, you most learn have to accept correction, i read some posts in technically board and i noticed one person is into arguments with almost six people in one thread, so began to reason this don't want to agree with the majorities, and that argument results ban in technically board, which the person can't post there. So we need to accept our mistakes if we wants to learn.4. Read the pinned post'sReading of pinned post is like reading an organization minutes book, so it will refreshing the reader and insert new old informations that happened in the past, and reading such post is educative, which i will advice any newbies to make sure he/she reads any pinned post across any board's.5. Make quality post'sA quality post is a post that is understandable and have more facts and it doesn't matter how long and short the post looks like, but what is concerned is the content. I have seen some Post that the content is short and it's meaningful and someone regards it as quality posting. Any body can define what is quality post to the level it understand it.6. Preview before postingPreviewing should be necessary, because through preview it's the area you can boldly notice your errors of typography, so my mates supposed to know that the easiest way to correct your mistake is through preview of work, and nobody supposed to be exempted from previews of work for skipping of errors.7. Avoid copy & paste work Copy and paste work, i find out that it's against the rules and regulations of the forum, after reading the terms and conditions of the forum, don't claim work of someone as original author or paragraphs a work, so we have to avoid this things newbies.8. Be creativeCreativity is another thing that do help to grow, since i have being reading post's i have not seen were two persons creates one topic, so creativity is what makes people to be known and also have influence to others, creating function that have not been done in the forum is what the forum needs. I will be glad for people to recommend me Post's to read, because I'm fully ready to learn and also correct me in anywhere my points is not encouraging

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Onyeeze on February 17, 2023, 02:53:13 AMI will be glad for people to recommend me Post's to read, because I'm fully ready to learn and also correct me in anywhere my points is not encouragingOP, I congratulate you on your joy, but if you are asking for advice on topics, then for your further achievements, please use this topic.  Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great! We all understand how happy newcomers are when they advance in rank, but you have to understand what a forum will become if each newcomer creates a separate topic dedicated to his happiness for each occasion.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: I’m happy you’re getting rewarded for your contributions, there's a kind of exhilaration to one’s getting merit for the first time. But I don’t think you should be posting all this, if it does mean a lot to you that you have to, post it  here Take your own advice and lock this topic Quote from: Onyeeze on February 17, 2023, 02:53:13 AMI will be glad for people to recommend me Post's to read, because I'm fully ready to learn and also correct me in anywhere my points is not encouraging  You’d find everything here Beginners & Help Encyclopedia  Ratimov's Forum Guides, Tutorials & Lists

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Also had one thing I've observed which has always put a smile on my my face whenever i remember it, posting something meaningful is not all by the magnitude of the content of your post and i love the way people also administered to their actions, you will discover i single line post with meaningful thoughts being attracted with merits  while a whole page post with confusing words and unspecific direction ended not being appreciated, which means not how far but how well, OP i believe you would have come across the ranking up thread but chose to go by this way, learn and be who you are.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Oh gawd, are these guide topics where newbies advise other newbies what to do (and actually not following theirs own advice) ever stop showing up?@OP you at taking bitcointalk way to seriously. This is just a discussion forum where people comes to exchange opinion and eventually learned something new and you made it look like some of company where people come to work.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.created_time: February 17, 2023, 07:49:22 PMLast edit: February 17, 2023, 07:59:46 PM by CryptoHeadlineNews

It always seems impossible until the day you earn your first 1 merit, because every high rank you see today was once in that shoe and we all know how it felt like that someone appreciated our content to be worth meriting for the first time. But one thing you just need to understand is that growth is a gradual process, and as such, it's always good to obey all the rules and guidelines which governs a place/online community such as this forum, and avoid shortcuts, because just as you have earn 16merits today, if only you can remain consistent, while providing value to the bitcointalk community, your growth is rest assured

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Congrats on your achievement and understanding of the forum rules and regulations. But you, as a newbie, is advising other newbies on how to use this forum and what to do or not, which I found very unrealistic. I am sure most of the members also found this very disturbing. If you truly care about merit and if you truly learned about this forum, I think you wouldn't have posted this thread.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: From your post I can conclude that you invest time in writing. With more effort I am sure you will get more merits. Just spend more time on learning about and observing the the Bitcoin space and your contributions to the forum will improve which will attract more merits. I am not a fan of open celebration of achievements because they attract unnecessary attacks. Therefore you didn't need to announce you victories for everybody to hear or see. Just keep giving out quality information and merits will naturally come.

comments.body: It's good and I'm delighted for you because it takes time and a thorough comprehension of the forum to earn merits, especially when you're new to the forum. I suppose some individuals find it challenging Since they are solely concerned in merits and end up spamming the site. This is a place where we can exchange knowledge about bitcoin with other users. I'm here to learn about bitcoin, and so far I've picked up a lot of knowledge. I'm also trying to help out as much as I can on the forum.
